de.dirkgasser.brauen

Class TemperaturSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dirkgasser.brauen.TemperaturSensor

  • public class TemperaturSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads the temperature from a DS18B20 sensor.
    DS18B20 connections:
    red (VCC 3,3 V), yellow (Data), black (GND)
    W1 interface for BS18B20 must be configured in
    /boot/config.txt
    : dtoverlay=w1-gpio,gpiopin=4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemperaturSensor()
      Sensor must be connected before instance in created
      Instance will contain a list of all DS18B20 which are connected

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getId()
      Get the sensor id of currently selected sensor
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getList()
      returns a list of all connected DS18B20 sensors
      double getTemp()
      returns the current temperaturs in Celsius of the currently selected sensor if read of temperatur fails 0 is returned
      void setId(java.lang.String id)
      Set the sensor id

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Get the sensor id of currently selected sensor
        Returns:
        sensor id from /sys/bus/w1/devices

      • setId

        public void setId(java.lang.String id)
        Set the sensor id

        id - sensor id in /sys/bus/w1/devices

      • getList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getList()
        returns a list of all connected DS18B20 sensors
        Returns:
        getList ArrayList with names in /sys/bus/w1/devices

      • getTemp

        public double getTemp()
        returns the current temperaturs in Celsius of the currently selected sensor if read of temperatur fails 0 is returned
        Returns:
        getTemp current temperaturs in Celsius
